mapper.select: SELECT (IFNULL(a.order_by, 0) + 1) orderBy FROM app_workbench_page a WHERE a.parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY a.order_by DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT a.id, a.title, a.logo, a.url, a.type, a.parent_id parentId, b.title parentTitle, a.order_by orderBy, c.desktop_name desktopName, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM app_workbench_page d WHERE a.id = d.parent_id) childNum, a.create_id createId, CONVERT(a.create_time, char) createTime, a.last_update_id lastUpdateId, CONVERT(a.last_update_time, char) lastUpdateTime FROM app_workbench_page a LEFT JOIN app_workbench_page b ON a.parent_id = b.id LEFT JOIN sys_eve_desktop c ON a.desktop_id = c.id
${sqlExtract}
AND a.title LIKE '%${keyword}%'
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC

SELECT b.id, b.order_by orderBy, a.order_by thisOrderBy FROM app_workbench_page a, app_workbench_page b WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.order_by > b.order_by AND a.type = 2 AND b.type = 2 AND a.parent_id = #{parentId} AND b.parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY b.order_by DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT b.id, b.order_by orderBy, a.order_by thisOrderBy FROM app_workbench_page a, app_workbench_page b WHERE a.id = #{id} AND b.order_by > a.order_by AND a.type = 2 AND b.type = 2 AND a.parent_id = #{parentId} AND b.parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY b.order_by ASC LIMIT 1
